users.about: Imagine the clouds dripping. Dig a hole in your garden to put them in.

Hi everyone! I’ve recently moved to Barcelona and I would like to get to know my  new neighbourhood. This year has been a big change, and it’s overwhelming. So I hope that I can meet the community and help each other out.  I am friendly and sociable. My Spanish is basic and improving, but I am fluent in English and Romanian. My main background is in arts(photography, graphic design), and soon to be a developer.

^_^ Hey! I'm Daena, a Spanish 34yo transgender girl that has recently learnt how to properly code (a full-stack developer, so we're called!). I also like fashion, videogames and fitness. Message me if you are interested in my skills!
Beth here. Nice to meet you guys!
I'm Emefa, and it's nice to meet you.
Hello! I'm Marcel and I used to be a geography teacher. I mostly spend my time doing what I like.
I'm Anna, and I'm a multi tasking person.
I'm Martin, and I'm estonian. I've been living in this neighbourhood for 5 years. Hope to see you around!

jobs.title: Catsitter
jobs.description: I am a cat lover. I offer reliable service including: litter changing, petting, playing, feeding, overstay if necessary.

jobs.title: Gardener
jobs.description: Green environment makes city life balanced. I help creating a calmer space using my knowledge about japanese gardening to help making small gardens inside small apartments.

jobs.title: Dog walker
jobs.description: As I got some free time at the moment, I would like to help a neighbour with their dog walking.

jobs.title: Dinner workshop
jobs.description: I love making homemade food, and I would like to share my skills with a neighbour. I offer evening workshops  where you’ll learn to be more efficient and diverse with your meals. My idea is that we can cook together as I used to do with my family. I believe this is the best way to cook in the evening and relax. Available for individuals and  small groups.

jobs.title: Webpage design
jobs.description: Need a webpage for your bussiness? Of course you need one! Nowadays if you are not on the internet you don't even exist. Contact me and make your bussiness grow in a way you've never seen before.

jobs.title: Looking for belly dance classes
jobs.description: I'm looking for some place in the neighbourhood that they teach belly dancing at.

jobs.title: English teacher
jobs.description: Native english speaker with teaching experience.For more details please message me

jobs.title: Yoga teacher
jobs.description: I offer yoga classes customised to the client's needs.
